DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy selective laser trabeculoplasty prior fail phacoemulsification Eximer Laser Trabeculectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Selective Laser Trabeculoplasty After Failed Phacoemulsification With Eximer Laser Trabeculectomy
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate efficacy selective laser trabeculoplasty fail combined procedure phacoemulsification cataract extraction intraocular lens implantation plus Eximer Laser Trabeculectomy open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . The success SLT determine intraocular pressure number hypotensive drug .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension diagnosis cataract diagnosis angle closure glaucoma optic neuropathy glaucoma
